title: Woman dies in Droitwich house fire
article: A woman in her 30s has died after a house fire in Worcestershire. West Midlands Ambulance Service (WMAS) said paramedics were called to the house on Meadow Court in Droitwich shortly after 21:00 GMT on Tuesday. A spokesperson said the victim had been rescued from the house by firefighters who were administering first aid. WMAS said her condition was critical and paramedics began advanced life support, however "it became apparent nothing could be done to save her". She was confirmed dead at the scene.West Mercia Police confirmed it was working with Hereford and Worcester Fire and Rescue Service to establish the cause of the blaze.
